sentences.sContent: I don’t shoot up and I’m not worried about blood transfusions, so gonorrhea, chlamydia, HPV, AIDS, etc, have nothing over me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I don’t shoot up and I’m not worried about blood transfusions, so gonorrhea, chlamydia, HPV, AIDS, etc, have nothing over me.
sentences.sCn: 我没有撕痛，我不担心血液交换，所以淋病、衣原体、人类乳头状病毒和艾滋病等等，都于我何加焉。

sentences.sContent: The study did not include syphilis, gonorrhea or HIV, as earlier studies found very low prevalence of these diseases in this age group.
sentences.sContent_eng: The study did not include syphilis, gonorrhea or HIV, as earlier studies found very low prevalence of these diseases in this age group.
sentences.sCn: 研究内容并不包括梅毒、淋病和艾滋病，正如先前的研究一样：在此年龄组里，以上疾病并不普遍。

trans.tranOther: a disease of the sex organs that is passed on during sex
